name: LD52: Blood Harvest
description:
You must harvest as much corn as possible before they harvest your blood.

This is my entry in to the Extra portion of Ludum Dare 52.

Controls

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look/Attack

ESC/P: Pause

Tools Used

  • Engine: Godot
  • Audio Implementation: Wwise
  • Sprites: Aseprite
  • SFX+Music: Reaper/Ableton
